import React from 'react'; import { ChevronRight, Users, UserPlus } from 'lucide-react'; const PatientStats = ({ data }) => { if (!data) { return (

Patient Statistics

No patient data available

); } return (

Patient Statistics

{/* New Patients This Month */}

New This Month

{data.newThisMonth || 0}

{/* Total Patients */}

Total Patients

{data.total || 0}

); }; export default PatientStats;
